00032 #ifndef _BIOTYPES_H_
00033 #define _BIOTYPES_H_
00034 
00035 // The length of the longest string returned by getGenderString()
00036 #define MAX_GENDER_STRING_LENGTH 10
00037 
00038 namespace affx {
00039 
00040   typedef unsigned char GType; // 1B
00041   
00042   /**  Types of Genotype calls made. */
00043   enum GType_enum {
00044     AA, ///< Homozygous A version of allele. (0)
00045     AB, ///< Heterozygous, one copy of both A and B. (1)
00046     BB, ///< Homozygous B version of allele. (2)
00047     NN,  ///< No call, unknown genotype.  The internal is value is '3'; external is '-1', 
00048     // Many places use '4' for the total calls.
00049     // Should we define TOTAL as 4?
00050     INVALID
00051   };
00052 
00053   int   GType_to_int(GType gtype);
00054 
00055   GType GType_from_int(int gtype_int);
00056 
00057   int   GType_valid(int gtype);
00058 
00059   int   GType_called(int gtype);
00060 
00061   /** Convert the enumerant to a value used by the CHP files
00062    * @param call The gtype call value.
00063    * @return The CHP file call value.
00064    */
00065   int GTypeCallToChpValue(GType call);
00066 
00067   //////////
00068   /** Those pesky XY people need a different prior for all the SNPs on
00069       X that aren't on the psuedoautosomal region. */
00070   
00071   enum Gender {
00072     Female,  ///< Has XX chromosomes
00073     Male,    ///< Has XY chromosomes
00074     UnknownGender  ///< Don't know genotype, use XX model.
00075   };
00076   
00077   //
00078   const char* getGenderString(affx::Gender gender);
00079   
00080   affx::Gender flipMaleFemaleGender(affx::Gender gender);
00081   
00082 
00083 };
